isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - REMOTE PTO SPEED CONTROL (RPTO) - PTO IN-CAB INTERFACE

svcproc.title: PTO IN-CAB INTERFACE
svcproc.para: This parameter indicates to the on-board electronics if PTO speed control is on and active the operator In-Cab interfaces are ignored. These interfaces include accelerator pedal, driveline engagement signal, brake pedal and the dash Cruise Control switches.

step1.para: ENABLE: Continue to monitor In-Cab operator interfaces.
